0.text: Innate: Kassadin is permanently  ghosted and takes 10%  reduced  magic damage.
Active: Kassadin fires an orb of void energy at the target enemy that deals magic damage and  disrupts their ongoing  channels.

1.text: He then gains a  shield that absorbs magic damage for 1.5 seconds.

0.text: Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks deal 20 (+ 10% AP) bonus magic damage  on-hit.

1.text: Active: Kassadin empowers his blade, causing his next basic attack within the next 5 seconds to have an  uncancellable windup, gain  50 bonus range, deal increased bonus magic damage, and restore  mana, with the restoration amount quintupled against  champions.

2.text: Nether Blade  resets Kassadin's basic attack timer.

0.text: Passive: Kassadin gains a stack of Void Energy each time he or a nearby champion uses an ability, which stacks up to 6 times.

1.text: Active: Kassadin emits a pulse of void energy in a cone in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies and  slows them for 1 second.

0.text: Active: Kassadin  blinks toward the target location, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies upon arrival. He then gains a stack of Riftwalk that lasts 15 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent casts and stacks up to 4 times.

1.text: Riftwalk: For each stack, Riftwalk gains bonus damage at an increased  mana cost.

2.text: Riftwalk will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Glory: Gain 2 stacks for each champion kill and 1 stack for each assist, up to a maximum of 10 stacks. Lose 5 stacks on death. Stacks are preserved when upgrading to Mejai's Soulstealer.
Unique – Dread: Gain 4 ability power for each stack of Glory.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – GLORY: Gain 2 stacks for each champion kill and 1 stack for each assist, up to a maximum of 10 stacks. Lose 5 stacks on death. Stacks are preserved when upgrading to  Mejai's Soulstealer.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Glaciate: Unleash a fan of icy shards in a cone in the target direction, dealing 100 (+ 30% AP) magic damage to all enemies hit and slowing them by 65% for 1 second. Enemies struck in the center of the cone are rooted for the same duration instead (30 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – GLACIATE: Unleash a fan of icy shards in a cone in the target direction, dealing 100 (+ 30% AP) magic damage to all enemies hit and  slowing them by 65% for 1 second. Enemies struck in the center of the cone are  rooted for the same duration instead (30 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Awe: Grants ability haste equal to 0.5% bonus mana.
Unique – Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Affecting an enemy or ally with an ability consumes a charge and grants 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 if it's a champion, up to a maximum of 360 bonus mana.
Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at +360 mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – AWE: Grants ability haste equal to 0.5% bonus mana.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Stasis: Put yourself in stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering you untargetable and invulnerable for the duration but also unable to move, declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, or activate items (120 second cooldown).

0.concerningText: Active: Kassadin empowers his blade, causing his next basic attack within the next 5 seconds to have an  uncancellable windup, gain  50 bonus range, deal increased bonus magic damage, and restore  mana, with the restoration amount quintupled against  champions.
Active: Kassadin emits a pulse of void energy in a cone in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies and  slows them for 1 second.
Active: Kassadin emits a pulse of void energy in a cone in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies and  slows them for 1 second.

Active: Kassadin  blinks toward the target location, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies upon arrival. He then gains a stack of Riftwalk that lasts 15 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent casts and stacks up to 4 times.

1.concerningText: Riftwalk: For each stack, Riftwalk gains bonus damage at an increased  mana cost.
